column1: The Pit Room////Pretty good BBQ. The brisket was nice and fatty (how can fat taste bad)
column2: and the rib was fall off the phone tender with a nice smokey flavor. The sausages that we got were good. The jalape√±o and cheese had a good kick to it and the venison sausage was different and salty. The sides were ok
column3: but not my favorite ( the potato salad and Cole slaw). The BBQ sauce was a little tangy and spicy and smokey
column5: but I think I prefer the sauce from other BBQ places.
